metadata.title: CVE-2012-2126 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
RubyGems before 1.8.23 does not verify an SSL certificate, which allowsremote attackers to modify a gem during installation via aman-in-the-middle attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2126` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bundler - 2.3.15-1
ruby-bundler - 2.3.15-1
ruby-rubygems - 3.3.15-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rubygems package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.5-2').
rubygems package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.5-2').
